name: Proditur
description:
Legends say there is a hidden power deep inside this dungeon, power only bestowed upon the most fearsome knights. Long time has passed and no single soul has risen from the dungeon, and it is believed no such power inside the dungeon is real. It´s time to prove them wrong; venture into the dungeons alone or together with a pal in this action-packed game, with RPG and Adventure elements that will blend together into the secrets the dungeon has prepared for you...

Main Features:
- An RPG - Adventure game, based on random generated dungeons and enemies.
- Joystick and Keyboard enabled controllers (for both players)
- General settings, such as enabling music and FX.
- Custom controller mappings.
- Easy melee combat system, that will allow you face all enemies you encounter.
- Will be able to customize your character´s attributes, such as name and power.
- You can play on your own or on a Local Co-Op split screen experience.
- 5 levels of dungeons with enemies and bosses.
